item.title: Digital Camera
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Choose how you see the world, and pick the lens that matches your style: Choose just the right lens from Sony's extensive range of E-mount lenses, and bring your vlog to the next level with stunning and unique imagery.
  • A large-format image sensor for professional-quality images: The ZV-E10's impressive images are the result of the camera's large APS-C sized image sensor. Compared to a smartphone camera, the image sensor of the ZV-E10 is more than ten times bigger, allowing for beautiful, professional-looking images with high resolution and intricate detail.
  • Efficient light collection for high-quality images with minimal noise: The ZV-E10's large-format image sensor is designed to maximise light collection, producing 4K movies with high-quality images with less noise even when you're shooting in a dimly lit setting.
  • Instant access to control buttons: When you're shooting a vlog session the last thing you want to do is fumble for buttons. With the ZV-E10 you'll find the MOVIE button right on top, for quick access.
  • Designed for easy selfie and vlog shoots: Weighing in at just 364 grams (12.8 ounces), the ZV-E10 is ready to hit the road with you whenever you’re ready to vlog.
  • 4K video with oversampling for greater detail: The camera's internal 4K video recordings are made using a full-pixel readout from the sensor, allowing the collection of approximately 2.4 times as much data as is required for 4K (roughly equivalent to 6K).
  • Let Real-time Tracking do the focusing work for you: The ZV-E10's AI-driven14 Real-time Tracking is intuitive to use. Simply touch the monitor to indicate the subject you want to focus on and Real-time Tracking will take it from there, keeping a steady hold on the subject.
  • Fast, precise autofocus: Even quick-moving subjects stay in focus thanks to the ZV-E10's Fast Hybrid AF system. With 425 phase-detection points covering around 84% of the sensor's image area, this wide coverage and dense AF point placement help to precisely capture subjects that might otherwise be difficult to focus on.
  • Protection against recording failures: The ZV-E10 tells you at a glance that whether or not you are recording. A recording lamp on the front of the camera lights up in red, and the LCD monitor also displays a bold red frame, letting you know when recording is in progress.
  • Precise focus transitions for smooth-looking product reviews: With just the press of a button, you can activate the ZV-E10's Product Showcase Setting, ideal for product review videos. With the setting activated, whenever you hold a product up in front of the camera the focus will shift automatically to that object, and then back to your face again when you move the product out of frame. This setting is available even when image stabilisation is set to Active.
item.content:encoded:
Brand Sony
Model name ZV-E10L
Form factor Compact
Effective still resolution 24.2 MP
Special features Suitable for Vlogging
Optical zoom 4 x
Colour Black
Connectivity technology Bluetooth
Screen size 3 Inches
Item weight 343 Grams

item.description: Smooth rounded edges, polished finish, stylish designed for any decor,especially suited for minimalist interiors The ergonomic acrylic monitor riser gives you a very comfortable position, match eye-level, reduce strain on neck, back, shoulder and eyes The ergonomic keyboard stand with low front lip on the end, holds your keyboard perfectly and eliminate tension from the wrists,forearms and elbows One-piece acrylic […]
item.content:encoded:
• Smooth rounded edges, polished finish, stylish designed for any decor,especially suited for minimalist interiors
  • The ergonomic acrylic monitor riser gives you a very comfortable position, match eye-level, reduce strain on neck, back, shoulder and eyes
  • The ergonomic keyboard stand with low front lip on the end, holds your keyboard perfectly and eliminate tension from the wrists,forearms and elbows
  • One-piece acrylic monitor stand riser with additional storage space underneath to store full-size keyboard & mice and above for knickknacks, minimizes the messy clutter and saves desktop space
  • Monitor Stand Dimensions: 20.5″W x 3.5″H x 8″D; Keyboard Stand Dimensions: 17″W x 1.5″H x 5.5″D

item.title: Beat Headphone
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• High-performance wireless noise cancelling headphones
  • Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
  • Pure adaptive noise canceling (pure ANC) actively blocks external noise
  • Real-time Audio calibration preserves a Premium listening experience
  • Up to 22 hours of battery life enables full-featured all-day wireless playback
  • Apple's W1 chip and industry-leading Bluetooth technology keep you connected farther with fewer drop-outs
  • With fast Fuel, a 10-minute charge gives 3 hours of play when battery is low. Rechargeable lithium ion battery
  • Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multifunction on-ear controls and microphone
  • What's in the box: Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones, Carrying case, 3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Universal USB charging cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
item.content:encoded:
Brand Beats
Model name Beats Studio3
Colour Matte Black
Form factor Over Ear
Connectivity technology Wireless, Bluetooth, Infrared, Wired
Wireless communication technologies Bluetooth
Special features Sports-and-exercise
Included components 3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Carrying case, Warranty Card, Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones, Universal USB charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B), Quick Start Guide3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Carrying case, Warranty Card, Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones, Universal USB charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B), Quick Start Guide
